commit message: readme: mention Yandex Store, beta opt-in and F-Droid slowness
readme: update screenshots
readme: add Translation section
readme: use link to raw strings.xml

Media button: do play/resume when receiving KEYCODE_MEDIA_PAUSE

Sometimes when playback is paused play/resume button on bluetooth HS
causes pause event to be sent. Seen this on Xperia Z2 when podlisten
is being used along with music player
CatalogueFragment: escape special symbols in query
CatalogueFragment: return null cursor if SQL can't handle user query
CursorRecyclerAdapter: fix removing old items when swapping with null
subscribe dialog: broaden items in spinner to avoid misclicks

Sync: set feed state after processing all episodes

'Feed isn't loaded yet' will be shown in subscriptions tab until feed
isn't fully loaded and timestamped.
This fixes the problem when user sees 'Refreshed Jan 1st 1970' on new
feeds

Sync: reset feed refresh mode only after successful update

Otherwise when refreshing again after failed refresh, all episodes
got added to 'new episodes'
search: add localized string for episode frequency
SyncWorker: support audio url in link tag  instead of enclosure tag
SyncWorker: fix processing enclosures w/o mime type
strings: minor improvements to Russian localization
pass title, state, aURL and downloaded to episode tap handlers
don't query DB in UI thread when processing delete episode action
EpisodeViewHolder: display aURL when link to web page isn't available
SyncWorker: don't highlight short numbers (<11chars) as phone numbers
update PodcastCatalogue
SyncWorker: extract extractAudioEnclosure function
SyncWorker: implement logic that scans podcast web-page and finds RSS
reset podcast timestamp on subscription, not on every refresh
gradle: bump version to 1.3.4
